```{r setup}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

if ("package:Statamarkdown" %in% search()) {
  detach("package:Statamarkdown", unload = TRUE)
}

if (!require("pacman")) 
  install.packages("pacman", repos = "https://cran.rstudio.org")

if(!require("Statamarkdown")) {
  p_load_gh("hemken/Statamarkdown")
} else {
  library(Statamarkdown)
}

p_load(
  here, 
  conflicted,
  haven, 
  knitr,
  labelled, 
  gtsummary,
  tidyverse
)

here::i_am("_archive/here_anchor.R")
setwd(here())

statapath <- find_stata()
knitr::opts_chunk$set(engine.path=list(stata=statapath), comment=NA)

rm(list = ls())
```

sysuse auto
summarize
